reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Research Development and Training Centre to Tanzania

description.narrative: In this project It will be carried out by adult educational Cetre Kouvola necessary studies for launching the research development and training centre in Tanzania as Finnish-Tanzanian cooperation. Activities include? WP1: Identification of partners- Selec tion together with Nacte and Veta most suitable Tanzanian partners for establishing the research development and training centre among 700 available- it will be drawn up an agreement with partners where the common goal of joint Venture Centre is determine d- Completion of the existing Finnish consortium (JGV Partners) to achieve as strong knowledge capacity as possible for selected sectors? WP2: Analysis of Training Needs - Searching for potential customers and finding out their educational and training nee ds- Competitor analysis including the available training supply and its costs- It is agreed with Nacte to arrange the Finnish-Tanzanian vocational education seminar where the invited participates from business life and industrial companies have possibility to learn about Finnish vocational education methods and they have tell their wishes related tovocational training. ? WP3: and Design of Curriculums and training infrastructures of JV Centre - Based on previously mentioned studies it will be designed the curriculum for the training centre- In the first phase in this project the focus will be on hospitality transportation and logistics forestry nursing and social services and as a cross-cutting theme entrepreneurship ? WP4: Preparing the Business Plan - On the basis of studies made in previous work packages it will be prepared the business plan for the RDI- and Training Centre . The business plan studies all the expenses that should be covered by the revenues as well as by what kind of pricing model of produ cts and services expenses can be covered. The business plan creates the base for economic launching of the centre.? WP5 training for teachers of partner institutions It will be arranged training for teachers in partner institutions including implementation of vocational training in Finland in working life context and use of competence based qualifications.
